posts.title: Data Analytics
posts.author: Julius Kedienye
posts.content: Data analytics involves collecting, transforming, and interpreting data to identify trends, patterns, and insights that can be used to make informed decisions and solve problems.

posts.title: Information Management System
posts.author: Lauren
posts.content: An Information Management System (IMS) is a structured approach to managing an organization's information, encompassing its collection, storage, processing, and distribution.

posts.title: JavaScript
posts.author: Lawrence
posts.content: JavaScript is the programming language of the Web. JavaScript is easy to learn. This tutorial will teach you JavaScript from basic to advanced.
